name: The Knight Who Didn't Fight
description:
The Empire has agreed to the treaty for the end of the war but there's no way to reach the words to the fighting men so play as a Knight who cunningly avoided shedding more blood reaching the news to his armies and bringing the war to an end.

Controls For the game: 

Click the escape(ESC) key to open the menu

Q Key to save the game

Generic FPS controls WASD to move, and space to jump!

Gameplay/walkthrough in case you get stuck :)

Assets Used for this game:

Nature: Unity Standard Assets[deprecated]

Terrain: MapMagic 2(Free) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/terrain/mapmagic-2-165180

Vegetation Spawner: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/terrain/vegetation-spawner-177192

Environment Objects(Props/Buildings):  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/ultimate-fantasy-c...

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/free-orchestral-mus...

The FPS controller is from UFPS Character Controller which I got from a humble bundle which also seems to be deprecated.
